TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SqlFunctionAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 用於將使用者定義彙總的方法定義標記為 SQL Server 中的函式。

span.span: Used to mark a method definition of a user-defined aggregate as a function in SQL Server.

summary.span: 該屬性 (Attribute) 上的屬性 (Property) 反映使用 SQL Server 註冊型別時使用的實體特性。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會傳回檔案清單中指定的目錄路徑的彙總函式。The following example shows an aggregate function that returns a list of files in the specified directory path. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlFunctionAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlFunctionAttribute Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlFunctionAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlFunctionAttribute Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用者定義彙總上的選擇性屬性，用於指示這個方法應該在 SQL Server 中註冊為函式。

span.span: An optional attribute on a user-defined aggregate, used to indicate that the method should be registered in SQL Server as a function.

summary.span: 還用於設定函式屬性 (Attribute) 的 、、、、、 和 屬性 (Property)。

span.span: Also used to set the , , , , , , and properties of the function attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::DataAccessKind DataAccess { Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::DataAccessKind get(); void set(Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::DataAccessKind value); };

summary.span: 指出函式是否涉及存取 SQL Server 之本機執行個體中儲存的使用者資料。

span.span: Indicates whether the function involves access to user data stored in the local instance of SQL Server.
.: Does not access data.
.: Only reads user data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是。The default is . 時，也需要連接到遠端伺服器，如果交易整合所需的 （預設值）。is also required when connecting to remote servers if transactions integration is required (the default). 如果從資料表值函式 (TVF)，內部執行 TRANSACT-SQL 查詢屬性應該設定。If a Transact-SQL query is executed from inside a table-valued function (TVF), the property should be set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FillRowMethodName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 與資料表值函式 (TVF) 合約使用之 TVF 處於同一類別的方法名稱。

span.span: The name of a method in the same class as the table-valued function (TVF) that is used by the TVF contract.

value.span: 值，表示 TVF 合約所使用之方法的名稱。

span.span: A value representing the name of a method used by the TVF contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[CLR 觸發程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128026)。For more information, see [CLR Triggers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128026). ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Function1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Function1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDeterministic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指出使用者定義函式是否具有決定性。

span.span: Indicates whether the user-defined function is deterministic.

value.span: 如果函式具有決定性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the function is deterministic; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者定義函式稱為具決定性，如果它一定會產生相同輸出值，指定相同的輸入的值和相同的資料庫狀態。A user-defined function is said to be deterministic if it always produces the same output values given the same input values and the same database state. 屬性也可用於索引中索引計算資料行和索引檢視表的形式的函式的結果。The property is also useful for indexing the result of the function in the form of indexed computed columns and indexed views. 如果未指定這個屬性，此函式會假設為不具決定性。If this property is not specified, the function is assumed to be non-deterministic. 函式會存取本機資料可以是具決定性。Functions that access local data can be deterministic. 資料存取特性分別藉由擷取和屬性。The data access characteristic is captured separately by the and properties. 請注意到遠端伺服器存取該資料 (例如，使用連接到另一個 SQL Server 執行個體) 位於使用者定義函數。Note that data access to remote servers (for example, using a to connect to another SQL Server instance) is available in user-defined functions. 不過，您仍必須遵照宣告。However, you must still honor the declaration. Common language runtime (CLR) 函數會標示為決定性，如果它應該不會發生副作用，在遠端伺服器中。If the common language runtime (CLR) function is marked as deterministic, it should not cause side-effects in the remote server. 針對內容連接的副作用限制時，SQL Server 不會強制執行限制的副作用透過遠端連接。While side-effects against the context connection are restricted, SQL Server will not enforce the restriction for side-effects over remote connections. 此屬性的預設值為 `false`。The default value of this attribute is `false`. 不會標示為具有決定性的函式不一定會產生相同的輸出值，如果函式指定相同的輸入的值和相同的資料庫狀態。Do not mark a function as deterministic if the function does not always produce the same output values, given the same input values and the same database state. 標示為具有決定性的函式時不是真的具有決定性的函式可能會導致損毀的索引檢視表和計算資料行。Marking a function as deterministic when the function is not truly deterministic can result in corrupted indexed views and computed columns.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPrecise { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指出函式是否涉及不精確的計算，例如浮點運算。

span.span: Indicates whether the function involves imprecise computations, such as floating point operations.

value.span: 如果函式涉及精確的計算，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the function involves precise computations; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 函式的有效位數是其中一個用來判斷如果計算使用此函式的資料行可以編製索引的屬性。Precision of a function is one of the properties used to determine if computed columns that use this function can be indexed. 此屬性的預設值為 `false`。The default value of this attribute is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 函式應在 SQL Server 中註冊的名稱。

span.span: The name under which the function should be registered in SQL Server.

value.span: 值，表示函式應該要註冊的名稱。

span.span: A value representing the name under which the function should be registered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只能由 Microsoft Visual Studio 用於自動為使用者定義函式註冊指定的方法。This attribute is used only by Microsoft Visual Studio to automatically register the specified method as a user-defined function. 它不是由 SQL Server。It is not used by SQL Server. 下列範例指定使用者定義函式使用名稱參考`sp_scalarFunc`。Thee following example specifies that the user-defined function is referenced using the name `sp_scalarFunc`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Function1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Function1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::SystemDataAccessKind SystemDataAccess { Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::SystemDataAccessKind get(); void set(Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::SystemDataAccessKind value); };

summary.span: 指出函式是否需要存取 SQL Server 之系統類別目錄或虛擬系統資料表中儲存的資料。

span.span: Indicates whether the function requires access to data stored in the system catalogs or virtual system tables of SQL Server.
.: Does not access system data.
.: Only reads system data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 。The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TableDefinition { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 字串，當方法用做資料表值函式 (TVF) 時，表示結果的資料表定義。

span.span: A string that represents the table definition of the results, if the method is used as a table-valued function (TVF).

value.span: 值，表示結果的資料表定義。

span.span: A value representing the table definition of the results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只能由 Microsoft Visual Studio 用於自動為 TVF 註冊指定的方法。This attribute is used only by Microsoft Visual Studio to automatically register the specified method as a TVF. 它不是由 SQL Server。It is not used by SQL Server. 下列範例會指定使用者定義函式使用名稱參考`sp_tableFunc`。The following example specifies that the user-defined function is referenced using the name `sp_tableFunc`. `TableDefinition`屬性具有值`letter nchar(1)`。The `TableDefinition` property has the value `letter nchar(1)`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Function1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Function1.vb#11)]
